periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 4pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 90, with temperatures falling to around 87 in the afternoon. West wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 70, with temperatures rising to around 72 overnight. South southwest wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8am, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 8am and 10am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 88, with temperatures falling to around 83 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.
